data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Nara do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nara, Japan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Nara, Japan humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Nara, Japan to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Nara, Japan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Okinawan, Ryukyuan people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, remind your church in Nara that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Nara that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Nara, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

location.name: Nara
location.people_groups_list: Oki-No-Erabu, Japanese, Miyako, Ryukyuan, Burakumin, Amami-Oshima, Southern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Oki-No-Erabu (3,200), Japanese (120,880,000), Miyako, Ryukyuan (66,000), Burakumin (887,000), Amami-Oshima, Southern (1,800)
